fields.name: Enabled
fields.description: Whether to enable Azure Key Vault key management service. The default is false.

fields.name: KeyId
fields.description: Identifier of Azure Key Vault key. See [key identifier format](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/key-vault/general/about-keys-secrets-certificates#vault-name-and-object-name) for more details. When Azure Key Vault key management service is enabled, this field is required and must be a valid key identifier. When Azure Key Vault key management service is disabled, leave the field empty.

fields.name: KeyVaultNetworkAccess
fields.description: Network access of key vault. The possible values are `Public` and `Private`. `Public` means the key vault allows public access from all networks. `Private` means the key vault disables public access and enables private link. The default value is `Public`.

fields.name: KeyVaultResourceId
fields.description: Resource ID of key vault. When keyVaultNetworkAccess is `Private`, this field is required and must be a valid resource ID. When keyVaultNetworkAccess is `Public`, leave the field empty.
